search_results.snippet:
"Just the Way You Are" is a song by Billy Joel and the third track from his 1977 
album The Stranger that became Joel's first US Top 10 (reaching #3) and UK Top 
20 single, as well as Joel's first gold single in the US. The song also topped the 
Billboard Easy Listening Chart for the entire month of January 1978.
